name: Movie Debuts of  Five Actors Trivia Quiz | Movies | 5 Questions

questions.explanation:
Remembrance.

	This film from 1982 is about the royal navy sent on a 6 month mission to America.  Gary's character name is Daniel.

A Different Approach.

	Michael plays a filmmaker in this flick from 1978.  "All's Fair" was Michael's television debut in 1977 playing Lanny Wolf.

options: The Man Who Broke a Thousand Chains
questions.explanation:
Top Secret!.

	Val plays the singer Nick Rivers in this spoof.

Blankman.

	Greg plays a talk show host.  He was also a talk show host for real in "Talk Soup" and "Later with Greg Kinnear."

In the Mouth of Madness.

	This movie is from 1995.  "No Greater Love" is a television movie from 1996.
